dialogues: Ebenezer: Grace, you are the culprit.
Grace: UAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!!!! IT’S NOT FAIR, IT’S NOT FAIR, NOT FAIR NOT FAIR NOT FAIR!!!! I DIDN’T DO IT! IT WASN’T ME, WHY WON’T YOU UNDERSTAND?!
Grace: DON’T TAKE MY BOY AWAY, DON’T LET HIM GO BACK, PLEASE!! WITHOUT ME, HE’LL LIVE A HORRIBLE LIFE!!
Ebenezer: The evidence supports this claim enough.
Grace: … You… Y-You are truly H-HORRIBLE! One day… Y-you’ll pay for your sins!
